It's my "everything reuseable things" toolbox. The units to be used in your projects can be found in the "src" folder. Some features are explained on my blog or have been coded live on Twitch. Package: GetSystemLanguageISOCode_VCL
Routines
 NameDescription
GetCurrentLanguageCode

Get current language code (like "fr-fr" or "en-gb") The result is lower cased.

GetCurrentLanguageISOCode

Get current language ISO code (like "fr" or "en") This function returns first 2 letters of GetcurrentLanguageCode. The result is lower cased.
